name: (Do Not) Shoot Them In The Head!
name_original: (Do Not) Shoot Them In The Head!
description:
Actually, you should shoot them in the head.

It's not really a game but a Proof-Of-Concept that probably will became a full game if I won't grow tired of it.

Featuring fully working limb detachment system. Try to remove different parts of body and see, what happens. 

Thanks to LUCAPELUCA and Loxo3000 for ideas.

Try it, tell me all the bugs you found.
